name: PoWar!
description:
///Control\\\

A, D - movement

SPACE - jump

LMB - melee attack

RMB - range attack

SHIFT - strafe

///Story\\\

A long time ago, hundreds or thousands of years ago, a child lived in one of hundreds of fragmented states.
By the will of the Forces, or out of their stupidity, the world could not continue to live like this.
War.
A child seemingly doomed to death.
He survived and found himself in this war.
Dozens of years of turmoil and chaos were forgotten.
And a new Empire was built on the sea of blood.
One Empire.
A place where strength and power were valued.
The world has given development to culture and science.
And soon a new source of energy was discovered.
Having made this breakthrough, humanity has opened a window to the future.
But the future is emptiness.
There is no peace, it never was.
Power cannot emerge from the void …
But it also cannot go nowhere.
Like the blood spilled on the ground …
Will stay in her forever.
…
…
…
Each action has its own opposition.
People cannot live in peace.
The world itself will confront them …

///Problems\\\

The game has no sound because of a problem with WebGl.
